title: Lasagne & Chips
instructions: Fry the onions and garlic in a medium frying pan until softened
Add the mince to the pan and brown evenly
Once browned, stir in the tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes
Line a Baking Dish with Lasagne Sheets and spoon in half of the beef mixture
Add another layer of lasagne sheets on top, and add half of the jar of cheese sauce
Repeat by adding the remaining beef mixture, topped with another layer of lasagne sheets, followed by Cheese sauce
Add the lasagne and Chips to the oven and bake for 25 minutes.

reviews.comment: Delicious! Best lasagne I've ever had
Tasty, but could do with some grated cheese on top

title: Fish & Chips
instructions: Pre-heat your oven to 180 degrees Celcius
Lay out the Fish and Chips on a baking tray
Add the Fish and Chips to the oven and bake for 22 minutes.

reviews.comment: Nice and easy, but could do withy some peas
